select m.TABLE_SEQ, m.TABLE_ID, m.TABLE_NAME, m.TABLE_ID, m.VBG_CRE_DTM, m.VBG_CRE_USER, '0' as 'field_count', false as 'selected' from std_main m
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO std_main ( TABLE_NAME, TABLE_ID, VBG_CRE_USER, VBG_CRE_DTM ) VALUES ( #{TABLE_NAME}, #{TABLE_ID}, '이민수', now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE std_main SET TABLE_NAME = #{TABLE_NAME}, TABLE_ID = #{TABLE_ID}, VBG_CRE_USER = '이민수', VBG_CRE_DTM = now() WHERE TABLE_SEQ = #{TABLE_SEQ}
mapper.select: select TABLE_SEQ, COL_ID, COL_NAME, COL_TYPE, COL_SIZE, CASE WHEN COL_IDX = 0 THEN false ELSE true END AS COL_IDX, CASE WHEN COL_SCH = 0 THEN false ELSE true END AS COL_SCH, false as 'selected' from std_field where TABLE_SEQ = #{tableSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE std_field SET COL_NAME = #{COL_NAME}, COL_TYPE = #{COL_TYPE}, COL_SIZE = #{COL_SIZE}, COL_IDX = #{COL_IDX}, COL_SCH = #{COL_SCH}, VBG_CRE_USER = '이민수', VBG_CRE_DTM = now() WHERE TABLE_SEQ = #{TABLE_SEQ} AND COL_ID = #{COL_ID}
